title: Vader - Tibi Et Igni [Metal] (2014) (mp3)
description:
Vader - Tibi Et Igni [Metal] (2014) (mp3)

Vader is a death metal band from Olsztyn, Poland. Formed in 1983, the group was founded by then-bassist Piotr "Peter" Wiwczarek and guitarist Zbigniew "Vika" WrÃƒÂ³blewski. Vader went through several lineup changes over the years, and since 2011 comprises Wiwczarek on guitars and vocals, guitarist Marek "Spider" PajÃ„â€¦k, bassist Tomasz "Hal" Halicki, and British drummer James Stewart.

Starting as heavy metal group, Vader eventually went to thrash, speed, and then in the late 1980s became a death metal band. The band's name was inspired by Darth Vader from the Star Wars film series. Lyrical themes include stories by H. P. Lovecraft, World War II, horror, and anti-religious messages. According to Billboard magazine, by 2002 Vader sold approximately 500,000 releases around the world.
